thread.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Katrina Kaif's 'Jagga Jasoos' release delayed? Anurag Basu spills the beans | Zee News
thread.title_full: Ranbir Kapoor, Katrina Kaif's 'Jagga Jasoos' release delayed? Anurag Basu spills the beans | Zee News

title: Ranbir Kapoor, Katrina Kaif's 'Jagga Jasoos' release delayed? Anurag Basu spills the beans | Zee News
text:
Ranbir Kapoor, Katrina Kaif's 'Jagga Jasoos' release delayed? Anurag Basu spills the beans By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 14:35 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Fans of Ranbir Kapoor and Katrina Kaif are eagerly looking forward to 'Jagga Jasoos' which is slated to release on April 7. But,the makers of the film are concerned because board exams of secondary school children are usually scheduled in April, and the film's release in the same month could affect its collections at the Box Office. 
Filmmaker Basu, who has previously worked with Ranbir in 'Barfi!', is contemplating to change the release date of the film because 'Jagga Jasoos' is a fantasy- fiction primarily meant for family audiences. 
Basu took to Twitter on Monday to say that his team were thinking of postponing the movie's release. 
"#JaggaJasoos is a Family Holiday film. Since exams r pushed at most of the places, We r contemplating the delay. Only IF v get a better Date," the 42-year-old filmmaker tweeted. #JaggaJasoos is a Family Holiday film Since exams r pushed at most of the places We r contemplating the delay Only IF v get a better Date 
— anurag basu (@basuanurag) 19 February 2017 But for now team is getting ready for 7th April. 
— anurag basu (@basuanurag) 20 February 2017 
He further posted on the social media, "But for now team is getting ready for 7th April." Well, these are comforting words for fans who have been earnestly waiting to watch the already 'much delayed' film in April. MUST READ 
'Jagga Jasoos' reportedly revolves around a teenage detective who is in search of his missing father. It was expected to release last year, but things got delayed due to the breakup of the lead duo, rumour mills suggested. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 14:35 More from zeenews
